name: Rootcraft
description:
Rootcraft is a turn based strategy game in which you should compete for the floor nutrients against other players.

CREDITS
  • Laurène de Peyrelongue as Game Designer and Ninja Manager
  • Alexey Dubinsky as Game Designer assistant
  • Diego Aguilar as 3D Artist and animator
  • Rubén Algora as Game Programmer
  • Miguel López as Game Programmer
  • Jaime as UI Programmer
  • Espacio RES Sevilla musicians as Audio Composers
